lore: These mobile anti-grav gun turrets mount railguns whose hypersonic rounds can stop even super-heavy war engines dead in their tracks. They form deadly fire points around which Tidewall Shieldlines and droneports are arrayed into full defence networks – floating fortresses that can reposition at need to funnel and slaughter the foe.

otherAbilities.name: Fortification
otherAbilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army:

otherAbilities.name: Tidewall Cover
otherAbilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

transport: This model has a transport capacity of 11 T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY models. It cannot transport BATTLESUIT, KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS models.
